column1: All my friends are heathens take it slow

column19: Who have rooms of people that they loved one day
column23: Just because we check the guns at the door
column24: 我们只不过从门后抄起了枪械
column25: Doesn't mean our brains will change from hand grenades
column26: 这并不代表我们会放下执念，把手里的榴弹忽略
column27: You’re lovin’ on the psychopath sitting next to you
column28: 你会爱上那个坐在你旁边的精神病患

column30: 你会爱上那个坐在你旁边的变态杀人犯

column32: 你会奇怪我是怎么不期而至坐到你身旁
column33: But after all I've said please don't forget
